title: marketstack node
content:
Use the marketstack node to automate work in marketstack, and integrate marketstack with other applications. n8n has built-in support for a wide range of marketstack features, including getting exchanges, end-of-day data, and tickers.

On this page, you'll find a list of operations the marketstack node supports and links to more resources.

Refer to [marketstack credentials](../../credentials/marketstack/) for guidance on setting up authentication.

- End-of-Day Data
  - Get All
- Exchange
  - Get
- Ticker
  - Get

## Templates and examples

**AI-Powered Financial Chart Analyzer | OpenRouter, MarketStack, macOS Shortcuts**

[View template details](https://n8n.io/workflows/2970-ai-powered-financial-chart-analyzer-or-openrouter-marketstack-macos-shortcuts/)

**AI agents can get end of day market data with this Marketstack Tool MCP Server**

[View template details](https://n8n.io/workflows/5205-ai-agents-can-get-end-of-day-market-data-with-this-marketstack-tool-mcp-server/)

**Detect Stock Price Anomalies & Send News Alerts with Marketstack, HackerNews & DeepL**

[View template details](https://n8n.io/workflows/10306-detect-stock-price-anomalies-and-send-news-alerts-with-marketstack-hackernews-and-deepl/)

[Browse marketstack integration templates](https://n8n.io/integrations/marketstack/), or [search all templates](https://n8n.io/workflows/)
